content:
Subject: Re: Agentic AI

Dear Lemessa Ahmed,

I acknowledge receipt of your email and appreciate your interest in discussing Agentic AI. I understand that you would like to schedule a meeting to explore this topic further.

To confirm, I will provide the following next steps:

* I will review my schedule and propose a few time slots for the meeting.
* I will send you a calendar invitation with the proposed meeting times.
* Once you have selected a time that suits you, I will send a formal meeting invitation with all the necessary details.

Please find my available time slots for the meeting on February 22nd:

- 09:00 - 10:00
- 10:00 - 11:00
- 11:00 - 12:00
- 14:00 - 15:00
- 15:00 - 16:00
- 16:00 - 17:00
- 17:00 - 17:00

Please let me know which time slot works best for you, and I will send a formal meeting invitation.

Thank you for your patience and understanding. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
